item.title: Hillary Clinton wants testimony on Jeffrey Epstein in public: 'Let's stop the games'
item.description: "You love to talk about transparency. There's nothing more transparent than a public hearing," Hillary Clinton told House Oversight Committee leaders.

item.title: Trump would decide whether to investigate Fed pick Warsh over refusal to cut rates: Bessent
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent left the door open to suing Kevin Warsh as Fed chair in testimony to the Senate Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs Co...

item.title: Warren to call for reversal of Trump's UAE chip sales after 'Spy Sheikh' revelations
item.description: President Donald Trump made a deal in May to send 500,000 of the most advanced U.S. AI chips to the United Arab Emirates.

item.title: Trump says he'll stay out of Netflix, Paramount Skydance fight to take over WBD
item.description: Trump in December said he would be involved in the review of whether Netflix should be allowed to buy parts of Warner Bros. Discover, as WBD leadershi...

item.title: Paul Weiss Chairman Brad Karp resigns after Jeffrey Epstein email disclosures
item.description: The Department of Justice last week released millions of documents related to the notorious sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
